overview: Tom (Dick Chibbles) sits on a couch, nervously tapping his foot, while his therapist wraps up the session. The therapist reminds the sexual predator of the main goal at this stage in his treatment. It is all about behavior management and how Tom must work on identifying his specific risk factors to develop a plan for preventing harm in the future. When heâ€™s tempted by eighteen-year-old cheerleader Tom starts to get an erection and covers it, pinching himself and trying to keep control. Kim (Jill Kassidy) notices this and smiles, as it becomes clear that she is purposely trying to get his attention. Veronica (Kristen Scott) Fucks Her Teacher (Danny Mountain) after persuading him to improve her grade.
title: Cheer Practice
